description: The function is vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS) attacks. The function does not validate the input 'userAgent' before processing it. If an attacker provides a very large 'userAgent' string, it could cause the application to consume excessive resources, leading to a DoS condition. This is related to CWE-20: Improper Input Validation and CWE-400: Uncontrolled Resource Consumption ('Resource Exhaustion'). Although there is a check for the length of 'userAgent' and it is limited to the first 1000 characters, this may not be sufficient to prevent resource exhaustion in all cases, especially if the function is called repeatedly in
